subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Fernando Alonso, the two-time defending Formula One champion, outdueled Felipe Massa on a slippery track yesterday, passing him late in the race to win the European Grand Prix at the Nürburgring in Germany. Alonso moved 2 points behind the leader, Lewis Hamilton, in the standings. Hamilton, a rookie, was ninth, finishing out of the top three for the first time in 10 races.
